Frontline.description: Spending on: Payments made for services and care provided by physicians and practitioners, Midwifery Services, Ontario Drug Programs, HIV/AIDS and Hepatitis C Programs, Operation of Hospitals...

Operations & Agency.description: Spending on: Clinical Education, Independent Health Facilities, Quality Health Initiatives, Assistive Devices and Supplies Program, Official Local Health Agencies...

Administrative & Opaque.description: Spending on: No Value, Minister's Salary, the Executive Council Act, Parliamentary Assistant's Salary, the Executive Council Act, Minister without Portfolio's Salary, the Executive Council Act, Parliamentary Assistants' Salaries, the Executive Council Act...

General Operations & Other.description: Minor health flows, adjustments, and other provincial health spending (capital, one-time payments).
